name: Bagpack
title: We got your backpack
description:
Opportunity can knock in any season, and only the bold can take on the bold. 
This Winter, buy a SOUNDBOK2, enter the code WINTERADVENTURE at checkout and you'll
                        get a BACKPACK for free.

name: Battery
title: Longer life for longer nights
description: The nights may be long, but our battery life is 40 hours strong.

name: Durability
title: Snow problem? No problem
description: Go ahead, throw a snowball at it. Yeah, that didn't even hurt.

name: High
title: No mountain high enough
description: Strap on that backpack and take a hike. Or two. Or three.

name: Deal
title: Free Backpack
description:
This Winter, buy a soundbok 2, enter the code WINTERADVENTURE at checkout, and
get a backpack for free. Want to explore new worlds and discover new experiences?
                        we've got your back at no extra cost.
